channel.title: Comments on: Hildreth Mansion – 357 South Hope Street

item.title: By: karwelis
item.dc:creator: karwelis
item.description:
the hildreth mansion became known as the house of sorrows, because of the tragedies
bunker hill is worth the effort
item.content:encoded:
the hildreth mansion became known as the house of sorrows, because of the tragedies

bunker hill is worth the effort

item.title: By: Grover
item.dc:creator: Grover
item.description: That is so cool. I work at the NW corner precisely where the Hildreth mansion stood. the area is now a large common area where manyy people eat lunch. And yet none of them know of the sad tale of the Hildreth Mansion. A sad tale for sure.
item.content:encoded: That is so cool. I work at the NW corner precisely where the Hildreth mansion stood. the area is now a large common area where manyy people eat lunch. And yet none of them know of the sad tale of the Hildreth Mansion. A sad tale for sure.
